extendedInfo.description: aTorrent - Native P2P BitTorrent Software for Android devices. Download files with ease right to your phone or tablet! Magnet links supported! Ad-driven version. Speed is not limited!Features: * Torrent search dialog * Magnet links support * Open torrents right from browser * Add torrent from file * Choose download folder * Partial download (choose files from torrent) * Multiple parallel downloading * Option to limit downloads by Wi-Fi * Option to pause downloads when external power supply is not connected * Supported protocols: BitTorrent P2P, DHT, Advanced DHT Bootstrap, Magnet links, HTTP & UDP trakers * Large files support (for FAT32 SD cards - 4Gb maximum, for internal storage - unlimited)Ports: * TCP Bittorrent = 6881 * UDP DHT = 43133 * UDP Trackers = 43130Coming soon: * Many other features in development.Help us translate aTorrent to your native languages:http://crowdin.net/project/aTorrent/invite! If you have installed any Free RAM/Task manager application, then add aTorrent to it's exclusion list to avoid unloading from memory and stop downloading.Other Torrent software: uTorrent, Azureus, Vuze, Download, FDM, aDownloader, mTorrent, tTorrent

reviews.title: Very useful
reviews.comment: This is the best downloader apps,very fast and smooth,sometimes 6xxkb-1mb per second.Work perfectly in my Sony Xperia.
reviews.author: Yu Johnason

reviews.title: Brilliant
reviews.comment: Simple and brilliant, better than utorrent, you can even select where in the phone the downloads go. Magnificent
reviews.author: Kevin Croke

reviews.title: Trash
reviews.comment: This app handles magnet links like sh*t. Sits there and says \"Waiting for torrent information\" endlessly. Junk. Download Utorrent app or Bitorrent instead of this junk.
reviews.author: Michael Harris

reviews.title: Veteran
reviews.comment: This app works very well on galaxy s3.. increased connecting peers to 128 an getting 800kb-1mbps. Im expecting traffic management from my network to kick in v soon. Great app when your not being restricted by network provider
reviews.author: Jay Hurley

reviews.title: Prank
reviews.comment: The Best torrent prank app..I downloaded files only first 2 times after that the download doesnot start. I uninstalled and reinstalled this app many time but it is keep showing 0kbps download speed & 0% completed...I have also 150-250 Kbps speed..But atorrent doesnot downloading atleast 2.6mb
reviews.author: aneesh m.s

reviews.title: Simple and fast
reviews.comment: The best part is the app get the job done fast. It has full support for DHT, PEX and Local Discovery; many parameters are also changeable like the number of connection,  download directory.  Until now the app is stable, automatic resumes after change of network state. It also supports simple searching. However,  some stupid design errors exist like you can add trackers but cant remove or edit them!
reviews.author: Viet Anh Vo

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: Way better than the other torrent client I tried, I would recommend this to anyone interested in getting torrents on their andoid phone.
reviews.author: Travis Waldera

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: I\'ve been using this app to convert torrents for about six months and its great, I use it a work since I don\'t have my laptop with me.
reviews.author: Joseph Kitchen

reviews.title: Poor
reviews.comment: Useless on magnet links. Have wi-fi only ticked and then it downloads on my 3G!
reviews.author: Martin Bakeberg

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Is really good. Only one I\'ve found that let\'s you choose specific files to download.
reviews.author: Jesse Loniewski

reviews.title: Great App
reviews.comment: I already started watching GoT.  This app is grrreat!
reviews.author: jontorres16

reviews.title: Nice App, Gets The Job Done
reviews.comment: Works for me, what\'s not to like? I switched from uTorrent because this app offers selective file downloads. I have noticed on occasion my torrents are pausing themselves, but maybe this is due to temporarily losing wifi connectivity.  Encryption would be a usefull feature, as well as support for blocklists but maybe that is asking too much?
reviews.author: John Doughz

reviews.title: Perfect!!!
reviews.comment: Except for poor handling of magnet links(which is not very necessary) this app is just perfect. Far better then rest of the torrent clients
reviews.author: utsav sharma

reviews.title: Perfect!
reviews.comment: Using S4 and this app Works really gud bt consumes alot of battery even whn da screen is off... bt the best part its download speed is vry fast which is the only thing that matters. So im lovin it!
reviews.author: Imran Amin

reviews.title: Perfect torrent client
reviews.comment: This is most simple and elegant and fast and totally AWESOMENESS. Love it. Great work developers. 100 stars, but only 5 are available. Cheers :)
reviews.author: Shiva Kumar Avula

reviews.title: Outstanding
reviews.comment: Great p2p app, hasnt failed me  yet. Id recommend it to any1
reviews.author: james steck

reviews.title: Do not auto update
reviews.comment: I was using just fine. Speed is fine. Was busy downloading file when I received an update notification. Was on 3.4 of 4 Gig file when I updated. All downloads reset to 0. :-(
reviews.author: Alistair Mac Pherson

reviews.title: Best
reviews.comment: It is best torrent client for me, i\'ve used bittorrent and utorrent before this client....this seems to be better than those
reviews.author: Jagroop Singh Deol

reviews.title: Doesn\'t download
reviews.comment: Just says waiting for info then if you click the start button the torrent doesn\'t appear... Waste of my time!
reviews.author: Brandon Duchesne

reviews.title: Works great
reviews.comment: Fast multiple downloads. Love it
reviews.author: Frank Gallagher
